properties.description: Device Charging, Space to work, Wheelchair Accessible, Toilets, Accessible Toilet, Parking, Child Friendly, Sapcote Warm Spaces - other venues Sapcote Community Libray and Sapcote Methodist Church open at different times across the week. We have links to Hinckley Area Food bank and collect food for foodbank and can refer people for support. We also offer food support through a Hope@ project supporting families who are eligible for free school meals with food parcels in the school holidays. Also through Hope@ we support isolated with gifts/plants to show we care.
